description: Details of Condition 5 (detailed design drawings) of permission ref: 2019/6407/P dated 13/11/2020 for the 'Replacement of north-westerly extension including new windows at ground floor on northwest elevation; alteration and enlargement to south-eastern wing to include first floor extension; rebuild and extend rear extension to include lantern rooflight; enlargement of 2nd floor including raising height of rear gable, erection of two dormers and rooflights to north west elevation; removal and relocation of chimneys; solar panels to rear roof and glazed balustrade to 3rd floor roof terrace; alteration of front porch including limestone finish and alteration to front steps and door...'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
